## combine() function

Combines two arrays, either of which can be undefined. It always returns an array.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function combine<T>(one: T[] | undefined, two: T[] | undefined): T[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  one | T\[\] \| undefined |  |
|  two | T\[\] \| undefined |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

T\[\]
